title: Nemesis draft is...
body:
... stupider than Honey Boo Boo's entire family combined.

Where the hell is my URF mode Rito? 

It's not like you guys even have to MAKE the mode...

You ALREADY made it...

Make like Nike and...

JUST DO IT!

replies.body: The original One For All that is, not the mirror mode garbage that they re-released.

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ExETLmOV,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-02-15T06:00:29.418+0000)
>
> The original One For All that is, not the mirror mode garbage that they re-released.

The ideal One For All is, in my opninion, everyone as the same character (10 of the same champion), on Summoner's Rift not Howling Abyss. Maybe it wouldn't be as good but it'd be fresh...
Unlike URF.

> [{quoted}](name=Space Cowboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ExETLmOV,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-14T23:44:56.069+0000)
>
> ... stupider than Honey Boo Boo's entire family combined.
> 
> Where the hell is my URF mode Rito? 
> 
> It's not like you guys even have to MAKE the mode...
> 
> You ALREADY made it...
> 
> Make like Nike and...
> 
> JUST DO IT!

No it's not stupid, it's fuking cancer get it right

%%%% URF. I prefer Nemesis.
Nemesis URF though...

To be honest, I want gamemode which is Twisted Treeline and everyone is Hecarim called Hexarim since there is six Hecarims.
The only people that say URF mode was bad, are usually people that don't have the skill or are incapable of playing the game at such a speed.

> [{quoted}](name=Space Cowboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ExETLmOV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-15T00:11:52.406+0000)
>
> The only people that say URF mode was bad, are usually people that don't have the skill or are incapable of playing the game at such a speed.

No URF mode was bad because

* Everyone started taking it as serious as ranked

* Everyone started spamming nothing but OP champs

* If you weren't using an OP champ your team told you off

* Most of the OP champs were just %%%%ing cancer to verse

* It made the queue times on normals too long

I'll admit it was good for the first day before it devolved into this %%%%.

It's the same in Nemesis mode, only in reverse. 

"What? You gave them Jax? GG"

"Why would you give them Galio first up? They're just going to give us all AP champs now"

Same problems, less skill required.
Ahh well, looks like the only 4 people that were bad at URF mode actually read this post.

URF MODE! 
URF MODE!

BUMP THIS FOR URF MODE!
